meanings.definition: A short stanza at the end of a poem, serving as a conclusion or dedication.
meanings.sent1: The poet added an envoi to wrap up the poem neatly.
meanings.sent2: In poetry, an envoi is like a farewell message to the reader.
meanings.sent3: The envoi in the poem made everyone smile with its heartfelt goodbye.
meanings.sent4: Her envoi was like a gentle hug at the end of a beautiful story.
meanings.sent5: The envoi painted a vivid picture of the poem's final thoughts.

meanings.definition: A brief explanatory note at the end of a letter or document.
meanings.sent1: After the letter, she always included a thoughtful envoi.
meanings.sent2: The envoi at the end of the document clarified any confusion.
meanings.sent3: His envoi in the letter was a clever touch of humor.
meanings.sent4: The envoi acted like a helpful guide to the main content.
meanings.sent5: With a simple envoi, the message became crystal clear.

meanings.definition: A concluding section of a musical composition.
meanings.sent1: The envoi of the symphony left the audience in awe.
meanings.sent2: Musicians carefully craft the envoi to leave a lasting impression.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected envoi in the music piece brought a smile to everyone.
meanings.sent4: The envoi was like the grand finale of a spectacular show.
meanings.sent5: The envoi echoed through the hall, marking the end of the performance.
